metadata.title: CVE-2024-45624 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Exposure of sensitive information due to incompatible policies issue existsin Pgpool-II. If a database user accesses a query cache, table dataunauthorized for the user may be retrieved.

criterions.comment: pgpool2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
